question: Father left the property on the form of house. There are two brothers and one sister. What would be the share of each person
answer:
QUESTION

Father left the property on the form of house. There are two brothers and one sister. What would be the share of each person

ANSWER


Share:

If the deceased is survived by two sons and 1 daughter, then the Estate will be divided into 5 equal shares and distributed as follows: Each son will receive 2 shares. The daughter will receive 1 share.

It should alsobe noted that if the deceased was survived by wife/wives, mother, and father, they will also inherit.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
